defitem.label: Processed by: Ashley Wellens, Student Volunteer and Kira A. Dietz, Archivist,

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection consist of a typescript copy of a glossary of English-Spanish Nautical Terms, compiled by Stewart.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Henry Stewart Papers must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Henry Stewart Papers, Ms1983-006, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Henry Stewart Papers collection was acquired by Special Collections prior to 1983.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Henry Stewart Papers was completed in 1983. Additional description was completed in April 2011.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Henry Stewart graduated from Virginia Polytechnic Institute in 1929. He was from East Falls Church, Virginia. He studied chemical engineering. During his senior year, he left the military and joined Phi Kappa Phi, and the Capitol Club. He was also a part of the Episcopal Club from 1925 to 1929.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consist of a typescript copy of a glossary of English-Spanish Nautical Terms, compiled by Stewart.
